vote.title: Authorize the ratification of $2,000,000.00 to pay outstanding invoices due to various vendors for original manufacturer parts and labor services performed to maintain continuity of City operations after the expiration of existing contracts tied to master agreement BN1702 - Not to exceed $2,000,000.00 - Financing: Equipment and Fleet Management Fund ($1,218,500.00), Sanitation Services Fund ($375,000.00), General Fund ($300,500.00), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($101,000.00), and Aviation Fund ($5,000.00)
